segments.text: I have tickets to The Phantom of the Opera on Friday night . Would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'd love to . What time is the show ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds great . So , do you want to have dinner at 6:00 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , I'd like to , but I have to work late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's OK . Let's just meet at the theater before the show , around 7:30 .
segments.speaker: S2
